lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Yoooo, wassuh dude?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: What a day, huh? I could really use a cold one right about now.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: You guys sell beer here, right?

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: None of our drinks are refrigerated…

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Oh, Uh...

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: That's fine, just gimme a 6-pack of Akira Extras and I'll be on my way.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Sure, man. Could I check your ID first, though?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Uhhhh, yeah. 'Course you can. Lemme just go ahead and give you access to my age verification too.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: I'm in a hurry, so could we make this quick?

responses.responseText: Could I get your basic info?

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Could I verify you're over 18?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: You… already have it.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: I mean, that all looks good, right? Should show that I'm of age.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Could I get your basic info?

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Hey. Did you hear me?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Look, I'm in a hurry so could we just… get on with it?

responses.responseText: I still need your basic info.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Seriously, I need your basic info to sell you a beer.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Fine, here. Just hurry up and get me that beer, would you?

responses.responseText: This isn't you on the ID.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: This isn't you on the ID.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: I had a haircut.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Uhuh... and plastic surgery too?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Look, it's been a long day so I'm not really in the mood. I'll tip you 20 Neuros if you just gimme the beer and I'll be on my way.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Alright man, here you go. That'll be 16 Neuros

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Wait, for real?? Err, I mean, yeah. Thanks, my guy.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: And hey, here's a little something extra for being a chump- I mean champ about it!

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Could I get your postcode?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Huh? What? Uhh, sure whatever. Here you go.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Uhh, on second thought…

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Nope, not happening.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Crap… That didn't work…

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: I- I mean… Look, my friends put me up to this, okay?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: G-gimme that back, that's my dad's ID. He's gonna FREAK if he finds out I stole it to buy booze.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Akira Extra 6-pack, that will be 15,99 Neuros.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Uhh, on second thought...

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Nope, not happening.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Crap… That didn't work…

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: *they walk away in a hurry*
